text: Sire Records is an American record label. It is owned by Warner Music Group. It is also distributed by Warner Bros. Records. ==History== The label was founded in 1966 as Sire Productions by Seymour Stein and Richard Gottehrer. Each invested ten thousand dollars into the new company. Its early releases as a record label were issued in 1968. This was distributed by London Records. From the beginning, Sire introduced underground, progressive British bands to the American market. ==References== Category:American record labels Category:1966 establishments in the United States
title: Sire Records
